album.description: Images of ONU's astronomical observatory, where most astrophotos on this website were taken. It is equipped with a motorized roof which slides off to allow observation, along with telescopes, detectors, and cameras. See also the Students and Events section!
album.title: The Observatory

Creator JCP

Title Students viewing planets during the day.

Description Students viewing planets during the day. 8/27/16. Venus and Jupiter were both seen while the Sun was above the horizon. (But you must point this telescope at the Sun!)

Original Date 8/27/16, 7:09 PM

Make Canon

Camera Canon EOS DIGITAL REBEL XT

Focal Length (35mm) 29mm

Metering Mode Average

ISO Equivalent 400

Exposure Time 1/125s

Aperture ƒ/7.1

Exposure bias 0 EV

Exposure Program Program normal

White balance Auto white balance

Flash Flash did not fire

Resolution 1920 x 1280

name: ObservatoryNew1
comment: Images of ONU's astronomical observatory, where most astrophotos on this website were taken. It is equipped with a motorized roof which slides off to allow observation, along with telescopes, detectors, and cameras. See also the Students and Events section!
title: The Observatory
